channel.title: I need the following testscape help! codes that actually work please!
channel.description:
I want to be able to See my crown, When i compile them they give me 100 errors ... Please give me one with no errors.... Also I want to be able to change Starting Equipment, i can not find where to do it at... And I want to change shop prices.... I don't know how to do that either o.o.... They really need to arrange the (TUTORIAL LIST) from servers... LIke the ones for Testscape servers in all under the title TESTSCAPE SERVER CODES or something like that...
And yea... I wanna make it so that nobody but the admin will be able to get a phat.... please help me out ...
AND ALSO is it possible to have a code to where only Mod's and Admin's can use to Teleport me to Tutorial Island? And like how do i put shops and Items in Tutorial Island?
EDIT: I WANT TO CHANGE STARTING EQUIPMENT NOT INVENTORY!

item.title: I need the following testscape help! codes that actually work please!
item.dc:creator: @zammy1 zammy!!
item.description:
@zammy1 wrote:

to change starting enventy go to player.java

seach //Giving the player an unique look

under should be

		playerEquipment[playerHat]=1042;
		playerEquipment[playerCape]=6570;
		playerEquipment[playerAmulet]=6585;
		playerEquipment[playerChest]=3140;
		playerEquipment[playerShield]=3841;
		playerEquipment[playerLegs]=4087;
		playerEquipment[playerHands]=6629;
		playerEquipment[playerFeet]=6619;
		playerEquipment[playerRing]=-1;
		playerEquipment[playerArrows]=-1;
		playerEquipment[playerWeapon]=4151;

something like that

change it to

		playerEquipment[playerHat]=####
		playerEquipment[playerCape]=####
		playerEquipment[playerAmulet]=####
		playerEquipment[playerChest]=####
		playerEquipment[playerShield]=####
		playerEquipment[playerLegs]=####
		playerEquipment[playerHands]=####
		playerEquipment[playerFeet]=####
		playerEquipment[playerRing]=####
		playerEquipment[playerArrows]=####
		playerEquipment[playerWeapon]=###

change the ####s to the id of the weapon/armour/ring/arrows/boots/gloves

for nothing say like no ring put in “-1” without quotes

Read full topic
